comments.body: I think altcoin discussion is still helpful to share everything relating to altcoin, even if it is wallet-related. Besides,  most altcoin wallets are not like popular bitcoin wallets, which are just designed to support bitcoin alone. They always appear to be multi-wallet options. So leaving them in the altcoin discussion board is, to me, the best thing to do and not flooding the forum with boards that will merely make a difference.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Almost all wallets that support altcoins support Bitcoin, and the main reason for downloading a multi-currency wallet is that people do not risk trying many wallets. If these altcoins are not supported in hardware wallets or popular wallets, they will most likely be left on CEXs balance. also, altcoin withdrawal to wallets need to be monitored because it can be burned, restricting the possibility of sending it inside the wallet without the owner’s permission.But if we assume the importance of this board, you will need a real reason, which is that there are enough topics to create it. Can you collect 50 topics that talk about altcoin wallets? I will make a simple comparison, as this is a short list of topics[1] that talk about Lightning Network. The number of topics here exceeds 200. NOW Which is better, altcoin wallets board or Lightning Network board?[1] All Lightning Network Threads In One Place
